001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Composition;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticFactory;
005
006/**
007 * This class is a composition of 2 objects, named left and right.
008 *
009 * @param <L> the type of the left object
010 * @param <R> the type of the right object
011 */
012@Composition
013public class Pair<L, R> {
014
015    private L left;
016    private R right;
017    boolean immutable;
018
019    private Pair(L left, R right, boolean immutable) {
020        this.left = left;
021        this.right = right;
022        this.immutable = immutable;
023    }
024
025    /**
026     * Factory method to create a new immutable {@code Pair}.
027     *
028     * @param left  the left element
029     * @param right the right element
030     * @return a new {@code Pair} containing the given elements
031     */
032    @StaticFactory
033    public static <L, R> Pair<L, R> of(L left, R right) {
034        return immutable(left, right);
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Factory method to create a new mutable {@code Pair}.
039     *
040     * @param left  the left element
041     * @param right the right element
042     * @return a new {@code Pair} containing the given elements
043     */
044    @StaticFactory
045    public static <L, R> Pair<L, R> mutable(L left, R right) {
046        return new Pair<>(left, right, false);
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Factory method to create a new immutable {@code Pair}.
051     *
052     * @param left  the left element
053     * @param right the right element
054     * @return a new {@code Pair} containing the given elements
055     */
056    @StaticFactory
057    public static <L, R> Pair<L, R> immutable(L left, R right) {
058        return new Pair<>(left, right, true);
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Returns the left object
063     *
064     * @return the left object
065     */
066    public L left() {
067        return left;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Returns the right object
072     *
073     * @return the right object
074     */
075    public R right() {
076        return right;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Sets the left object
081     *
082     * @param left the left object to set
083     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the pair is immutable
084     */
085    public void setLeft(L left) {
086        if (immutable) {
087            throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
088        }
089        this.left = left;
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Sets the right object
094     *
095     * @param right the right object to set
096     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the pair is immutable
097     */
098    public void setRight(R right) {
099        if (immutable) {
100            throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
101        }
102        this.right = right;
103    }
104}
